```typescript
  id: number
  title: string
  cover: string
  stage: 'free' | 'basic' | 'advanced' | 'project' | 'landing'
```

```vue
<script setup lang="ts">
import { computed } from 'vue'

  course: Course

}

  showPopover: true
})

// é˜¶æ®µé…ç½®æ˜ å°„

  const configs = {
    free: { 
      text: 'ä½“éªŒ', 
      textClass: 'text-success',
      badgeClass: 'bg-info'
    },

      textClass: 'text-danger',

  return props.course.stage === 'free' ? 'å…è´¹' : `Â¥${props.course.price}`
})
```

```vue
<!-- components/CampSection.vue -->
<script setup lang="ts">
import { ref, computed, onMounted } from 'vue'
import { useCourseStore } from '@/store/course'
import CourseCard from './CourseCard.vue'
import type { Course } from '@/types/course'

interface Props {
  campTitle: string
  campSubtitle: string
  campType: 'skill' | 'career' | 'enterprise'  // è¥åŒºç±»å‹
  stageOrder?: string[]  // è‡ªå®šä¹‰é˜¶æ®µé¡ºåº
}

const props = withDefaults(defineProps<Props>(), {
  stageOrder: () => ['free', 'basic', 'advanced', 'project']
})

const courseStore = useCourseStore()
const activeStage = ref(props.stageOrder[0])
const activeTag = ref('photoshop')

// å½“å‰è¥åŒºçš„é˜¶æ®µé…ç½®
const stageLabels = {
  free: 'å…è´¹å¿«é€Ÿä½“éªŒ',
  basic: 'é›¶åŸºç¡€å…¥é—¨', 
  advanced: 'æŠ€èƒ½ç²¾è¿›',
  project: 'é¡¹ç›®å®æˆ˜',
  landing: 'é¡¹ç›®è½åœ°'
}

// æ ‡ç­¾é…ç½®ï¼ˆå¯ä»¥æ ¹æ®è¥åŒºç±»å‹åŠ¨æ€è°ƒæ•´ï¼‰
const tagConfig = computed(() => {
  const configs = {
    skill: ['photoshop', 'illustrator', 'AIGCåˆ›æ„è®¾è®¡', 'AI+logoè®¾è®¡', 'è™šå¹»å¼•æ“', 'æ¸¸æˆå¼€å‘'],
    career: ['AIå¹³é¢è®¾è®¡å¸ˆ', 'AIæ¸¸æˆè®¾è®¡', 'AIæ¸¸æˆå¼€å‘', 'AIGCåˆ›æ„è®¾è®¡å¸ˆ'],
    enterprise: ['å›¢é˜Ÿåä½œ', 'é¡¹ç›®ç®¡ç†', 'ä¼ä¸šåŸ¹è®­', 'å®šåˆ¶è¯¾ç¨‹']
  }
  return configs[props.campType] || configs.skill
})

// è¿‡æ»¤å½“å‰æ˜¾ç¤ºçš„è¯¾ç¨‹
const displayCourses = computed(() => {
  return courseStore.getCoursesByStageAndTag(activeStage.value, activeTag.value, props.campType)
})

// åˆ‡æ¢é˜¶æ®µ
const handleStageChange = (stage: string) => {
  activeStage.value = stage
}

// åˆ‡æ¢æ ‡ç­¾
const handleTagChange = (tag: string) => {
  activeTag.value = tag
}

// æ¢ä¸€æ¢åŠŸèƒ½
const refreshCourses = () => {
  courseStore.shuffleCourses(activeStage.value, activeTag.value, props.campType)
}

onMounted(() => {
  courseStore.fetchCourses(props.campType)
})
</script>

<template>
  <section class="camp-section py-4">
    <div class="container">
      <!-- æ ‡é¢˜åŒºåŸŸ -->
      <div class="row mb-4">
        <div class="col">
          <h4 class="uai-title">{{ campTitle }}</h4>
          <p class="uai-subtitle">{{ campSubtitle }}</p>
        </div>
      </div>

      <!-- é˜¶æ®µå’Œæ ‡ç­¾å¯¼èˆª -->
      <div class="category-nav-container mb-4">
        <!-- é˜¶æ®µæŒ‰é’® -->
        <div class="stage-buttons mb-3">
          <button
            v-for="stage in stageOrder"
            :key="stage"
            :class="['capsule-category-btn', { active: activeStage === stage }]"
            @click="handleStageChange(stage)"
          >
            {{ stageLabels[stage] }}
          </button>
        </div>

        <!-- æ ‡ç­¾å¯¼èˆªå’Œæ¢ä¸€æ¢ -->
        <div class="nav-and-refresh-container">
          <ul class="nav nav-tabs uai-nav-capsule flex-grow-1">
            <li v-for="tag in tagConfig" :key="tag" class="nav-item">
              <button
                :class="['nav-link', { active: activeTag === tag }]"
                @click="handleTagChange(tag)"
              >
                {{ tag }}
              </button>
            </li>
          </ul>
          
          <button class="refresh-btn ms-3" @click="refreshCourses">
            <i class="fas fa-sync-alt"></i> æ¢ä¸€æ¢
          </button>
        </div>
      </div>

      <!-- è¯¾ç¨‹å¡ç‰‡ç½‘æ ¼ -->
      <div class="row g-4">
        <div 
          v-for="course in displayCourses" 
          :key="course.id"
          class="col-sm-6 col-md-3"
        >
          <CourseCard :course="course" />
        </div>
      </div>

      <!-- æŸ¥çœ‹æ›´å¤šé“¾æ¥ -->
      <div class="row mt-4">
        <div class="col-12">
          <router-link 
            :to="`/courses?camp=${campType}&stage=${activeStage}&tag=${activeTag}`"
            class="more-link"
          >
            æŸ¥çœ‹æ›´å¤šè¯¾ç¨‹<span class="arrow">â€º</span>
          </router-link>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </section>
</template>
```

## ğŸ—‚ï¸ **æ•°æ®çŠ¶æ€ç®¡ç†ï¼ˆPinia Storeï¼‰**

```typescript
// store/course.ts
import { defineStore } from 'pinia'
import { ref, computed } from 'vue'
import type { Course } from '@/types/course'

export const useCourseStore = defineStore('course', () => {
  const courses = ref<Course[]>([])
  const loading = ref(false)

  // æŒ‰è¥åŒºã€é˜¶æ®µã€æ ‡ç­¾è·å–è¯¾ç¨‹
  const getCoursesByStageAndTag = computed(() => {
    return (stage: string, tag: string, camp: string) => {
      return courses.value
        .filter(course => 
          course.stage === stage && 
          course.tags.includes(tag) &&
          course.camp === camp
        )
        .slice(0, 4) // åªæ˜¾ç¤ºå‰4ä¸ª
    }
  })

  // è·å–è¯¾ç¨‹æ•°æ®
  const fetchCourses = async (campType: string) => {
    loading.value = true
    try {
      // è¿™é‡Œå¯ä»¥è°ƒç”¨APIæˆ–ä½¿ç”¨é™æ€æ•°æ®
      const response = await api.get(`/courses?camp=${campType}`)
      courses.value = response.data
    } catch (error) {
      console.error('è·å–è¯¾ç¨‹å¤±è´¥:', error)
    } finally {
      loading.value = false
    }
  }

  // éšæœºæ‰“ä¹±è¯¾ç¨‹
  const shuffleCourses = (stage: string, tag: string, camp: string) => {
    const filtered = courses.value.filter(course => 
      course.stage === stage && 
      course.tags.includes(tag) &&
      course.camp === camp
    )
    // å®ç°éšæœºæ‰“ä¹±é€»è¾‘
    courses.value = [...shuffleArray(filtered), ...courses.value.filter(c => !filtered.includes(c))]
  }

  return {
    courses,
    loading,
    getCoursesByStageAndTag,
    fetchCourses,
    shuffleCourses
  }
})
```

## âœ… **æ–¹æ¡ˆä¼˜åŠ¿**

1. **é«˜åº¦å¤ç”¨**ï¼šä¸€è¡Œä»£ç å°±èƒ½å¤åˆ¶å‡ºæ–°è¥åŒº

```diff
+ })
+ 
+ // äº‹ä»¶å®šä¹‰
+ const emit = defineEmits<{
+   addToCart: [course: Course]
+   watchNow: [course: Course]
+ }>()

+ // å½“å‰é˜¶æ®µçš„é…ç½®
+ const stageConfig = computed(() => STAGE_CONFIGS[props.course.stage])
+ 
+ // ä»·æ ¼æ˜¾ç¤ºé€»è¾‘
+ const displayPrice = computed(() => {
+   if (props.course.stage === 'free') {
+     return 'å…è´¹'
+   }
+   return props.course.price ? `Â¥${props.course.price}` : 'Â¥0'
+ })
+ 
+ // äº‹ä»¶å¤„ç†
+ const addToCart = () => {
+   emit('addToCart', props.course)
+ }
+ 
+ const watchNow = () => {
+   emit('watchNow', props.course)
+ }
+ </script>

+ <style scoped>
```

```diff
- 
+ <template>
+   <div class="camp-section">
+     <!-- å­¦é™¢æ ‡é¢˜ -->
+     <section class="mt-3 py-0">
+       <div class="container">
+         <div class="row">
+           <div class="col">
+             <h4 class="uai-title">{{ title }}</h4>
+             <p class="uai-subtitle">{{ subtitle }}</p>
+           </div>
+         </div>
+       </div>
+     </section>
+ 
+     <!-- è¯¾ç¨‹åˆ†ç±»è®¾ç½®å’Œæ ‡ç­¾å¯¼èˆª -->
+     <section class="py-0">
+       <div class="container">
+         <div class="category-nav-container">
+           <!-- ç¬¬ä¸€è¡Œï¼šå››ä¸ªä¸“åŒºæŒ‰é’® -->
+           <div class="free-zone-header">
+             <button 
+               v-for="stage in stageOrder" 
+               :key="stage"
+               class="capsule-category-btn" 
+               :class="{ active: activeStage === stage }"
+               @click="setActiveStage(stage)"
+             >
+               {{ STAGES[stage] }}
+             </button>
+           </div>
+ 
+           <!-- ç¬¬äºŒè¡Œï¼šæ ‡ç­¾å¯¼èˆªå’Œæ¢ä¸€æ¢æŒ‰é’® -->
+           <div class="nav-and-refresh-container">
+             <!-- å¯åˆ‡æ¢æ ‡ç­¾å¯¼èˆª -->
+             <ul class="nav nav-tabs uai-nav-capsule" role="tablist">
+               <li v-for="tag in tags" :key="tag" class="nav-item" role="presentation">
+                 <button 
+                   class="nav-link" 
+                   :class="{ active: activeTag === tag }"
+                   @click="setActiveTag(tag)"
+                   type="button" 
+                   role="tab"
+                 >
+                   {{ tag }}
+                 </button>
+               </li>
+             </ul>
+ 
+             <!-- æ¢ä¸€æ¢æŒ‰é’® -->
+             <button class="refresh-btn" :class="{ rotating: isRefreshing }" @click="refreshCourses">
+               <i class="fas fa-sync-alt"></i> æ¢ä¸€æ¢
+             </button>
+           </div>
+         </div>
+       </div>
+     </section>
+ 
+     <!-- è¯¾ç¨‹å†…å®¹å±•ç¤ºåŒºåŸŸ -->
+     <section class="mt-0">
+       <div class="container mt-0">
+         <div class="row justify-content-start card-scale" style="margin-left: 52px;">
+           <div 
+             v-for="course in displayedCourses" 
+             :key="course.id" 
+             class="col-sm-6 col-md-3 mb-4"
+           >
+             <CourseCard 
+               :course="course" 
+               @add-to-cart="handleAddToCart"
+               @watch-now="handleWatchNow"
+             />
+           </div>
+         </div>
+ 
+         <!-- æŸ¥çœ‹æ›´å¤šé“¾æ¥ -->
+         <div class="row">
+           <div class="col-12">
+             <div style="position: relative; margin-top: -20px; margin-bottom: 30px;">
+               <a href="#" class="more-link" style="margin-left: 52px; display: inline-block;" @click.prevent="viewMore">
+                 æŸ¥çœ‹æ›´å¤šè¯¾ç¨‹<span class="arrow">â€º</span>
+               </a>
+             </div>
+           </div>
+         </div>
+       </div>
+     </section>
+   </div>
+ </template>
+ 
+ <script setup lang="ts">
+ import { ref, computed, watch } from 'vue'
+ import CourseCard from './CourseCard.vue'
+ import type { Course, StageType } from '../types/course'
+ import { STAGES } from '../types/course'
+ 
+ // ç»„ä»¶å±æ€§å®šä¹‰
+ interface Props {
+   title: string
+   subtitle: string
+   camp: 'skill' | 'career' | 'enterprise'
+   stageOrder: StageType[]
+   tags: string[]
+   courses: Course[]
+ }
+ 
+ const props = defineProps<Props>()
+ 
+ // äº‹ä»¶å®šä¹‰
+ const emit = defineEmits<{
+   addToCart: [course: Course]
+   watchNow: [course: Course]
+   viewMore: [camp: string, stage: StageType, tag: string]
+ }>()
+ 
+ // å“åº”å¼çŠ¶æ€
+ const activeStage = ref<StageType>(props.stageOrder[0])
+ const activeTag = ref<string>(props.tags[0])
+ const isRefreshing = ref(false)
+ 
+ // å½“å‰æ˜¾ç¤ºçš„è¯¾ç¨‹ï¼ˆæ ¹æ®æ¿€æ´»çš„é˜¶æ®µå’Œæ ‡ç­¾ç­›é€‰ï¼‰
+ const displayedCourses = computed(() => {
+   return props.courses
+     .filter(course => 
+       course.stage === activeStage.value && 
+       course.tags.includes(activeTag.value) &&
+       course.camp === props.camp
+     )
+     .slice(0, 4) // åªæ˜¾ç¤ºå‰4ä¸ªè¯¾ç¨‹
+ })
+ 
+ // ç›‘å¬propså˜åŒ–æ—¶é‡ç½®çŠ¶æ€
+ watch(() => props.stageOrder, (newOrder) => {
+   if (newOrder.length > 0) {
+     activeStage.value = newOrder[0]
+   }
+ }, { immediate: true })
+ 
+ watch(() => props.tags, (newTags) => {
+   if (newTags.length > 0) {
+     activeTag.value = newTags[0]
+   }
+ }, { immediate: true })
+ 
+ // æ–¹æ³•
+ const setActiveStage = (stage: StageType) => {
+   activeStage.value = stage
+ }
+ 
+ const setActiveTag = (tag: string) => {
+   activeTag.value = tag
+ }
+ 
+ const refreshCourses = () => {
+   isRefreshing.value = true
+   
+   // è¿™é‡Œå¯ä»¥è§¦å‘é‡æ–°è·å–è¯¾ç¨‹æ•°æ®çš„é€»è¾‘
+   // ç›®å‰åªæ˜¯ç®€å•çš„UIåŠ¨ç”»
+   setTimeout(() => {
+     isRefreshing.value = false
+   }, 500)
+ }
+ 
+ const handleAddToCart = (course: Course) => {
+   emit('addToCart', course)
+ }
+ 
+ const handleWatchNow = (course: Course) => {
+   emit('watchNow', course)
+ }
+ 
+ const viewMore = () => {
+   emit('viewMore', props.camp, activeStage.value, activeTag.value)
+ }
+ </script>
```

```diff
-  
+ <template>
+   <div class="camp-section">
+     <!-- å­¦é™¢æ ‡é¢˜ -->

+           </div>
+         </div>
+       </div>
+     </section>
+ 
+     <!-- è¯¾ç¨‹åˆ†ç±»è®¾ç½®å’Œæ ‡ç­¾å¯¼èˆª -->
+     <section class="py-0">
+       <div class="container">
+         <div class="category-nav-container">
+           <!-- ç¬¬ä¸€è¡Œï¼šå››ä¸ªä¸“åŒºæŒ‰é’® -->
+           <div class="free-zone-header">
+             <button 
+               v-for="stage in stageOrder" 
+               :key="stage"
+               class="capsule-category-btn" 
+               :class="{ active: activeStage === stage }"
+               @click="setActiveStage(stage)"
+             >
+               {{ STAGES[stage] }}
+             </button>
+           </div>
+ 
+           <!-- ç¬¬äºŒè¡Œï¼šæ ‡ç­¾å¯¼èˆªå’Œæ¢ä¸€æ¢æŒ‰é’® -->
+           <div class="nav-and-refresh-container">
+             <!-- å¯åˆ‡æ¢æ ‡ç­¾å¯¼èˆª -->
+             <ul class="nav nav-tabs uai-nav-capsule" role="tablist">
+               <li v-for="tag in tags" :key="tag" class="nav-item" role="presentation">
+                 <button 
+                   class="nav-link"

+                   type="button"

+               @add-to-cart="handleAddToCart"
+               @watch-now="handleWatchNow"
+             />

+ 
+         <!-- æŸ¥çœ‹æ›´å¤šé“¾æ¥ -->

+             <div style="position: relative; margin-top: -20px; margin-bottom: 30px;">
+               <a href="#" class="more-link" style="margin-left: 52px; display: inline-block;" @click.prevent="viewMore">
+                 æŸ¥çœ‹æ›´å¤šè¯¾ç¨‹<span class="arrow">â€º</span>

+ <script setup lang="ts">
+ import { ref, computed, watch } from 'vue'
+ import CourseCard from './CourseCard.vue'
+ import type { Course, StageType } from '../types/course'
+ import { STAGES } from '../types/course'
+ 
+ // ç»„ä»¶å±æ€§å®šä¹‰
+ interface Props {
+   title: string
+   subtitle: string
+   camp: 'skill' | 'career' | 'enterprise'
+   stageOrder: StageType[]
+   tags: string[]
+   courses: Course[]
+ }
+ 
+ const props = defineProps<Props>()
+ 
+ // äº‹ä»¶å®šä¹‰
+ const emit = defineEmits<{
+   addToCart: [course: Course]
+   watchNow: [course: Course]
+   viewMore: [camp: string, stage: StageType, tag: string]
+ }>()
+ 
+ // å“åº”å¼çŠ¶æ€
+ const activeStage = ref<StageType>(props.stageOrder[0])
+ const activeTag = ref<string>(props.tags[0])
+ const isRefreshing = ref(false)
+ 
+ // å½“å‰æ˜¾ç¤ºçš„è¯¾ç¨‹ï¼ˆæ ¹æ®æ¿€æ´»çš„é˜¶æ®µå’Œæ ‡ç­¾ç­›é€‰ï¼‰
+ const displayedCourses = computed(() => {
+   return props.courses
+     .filter(course => 
+       course.stage === activeStage.value && 
+       course.tags.includes(activeTag.value) &&
+       course.camp === props.camp
+     )
+     .slice(0, 4) // åªæ˜¾ç¤ºå‰4ä¸ªè¯¾ç¨‹
+ })
+ 
+ // ç›‘å¬propså˜åŒ–æ—¶é‡ç½®çŠ¶æ€
+ watch(() => props.stageOrder, (newOrder) => {
+   if (newOrder.length > 0) {
+     activeStage.value = newOrder[0]
+   }
+ }, { immediate: true })
+ 
+ watch(() => props.tags, (newTags) => {
+   if (newTags.length > 0) {
+     activeTag.value = newTags[0]
+   }
+ }, { immediate: true })
+ 
+ // æ–¹æ³•
+ const setActiveStage = (stage: StageType) => {
+   activeStage.value = stage
+ }
+ 
+ const setActiveTag = (tag: string) => {
+   activeTag.value = tag
+ }
+ 
+ const refreshCourses = () => {
+   isRefreshing.value = true
+   
+   // è¿™é‡Œå¯ä»¥è§¦å‘é‡æ–°è·å–è¯¾ç¨‹æ•°æ®çš„é€»è¾‘
+   // ç›®å‰åªæ˜¯ç®€å•çš„UIåŠ¨ç”»
+   setTimeout(() => {
+     isRefreshing.value = false
+   }, 500)
+ }
+ 
+ const handleAddToCart = (course: Course) => {
+   emit('addToCart', course)
+ }
+ 
+ const handleWatchNow = (course: Course) => {
+   emit('watchNow', course)
+ }
+ 
+ const viewMore = () => {
+   emit('viewMore', props.camp, activeStage.value, activeTag.value)
+ }
+ </script>
+ 
+ <style scoped>
+ /* å­¦é™¢æ ‡é¢˜æ ·å¼ */
+ .uai-title {
+   font-size: 2rem;
+   font-weight: 700;
+   color: #000000;
+   margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
+   margin-left: 50px;
+ }
+ 
+ .uai-subtitle {
+   font-size: 1.125rem;
+   color: #666666;
+   line-height: 1.7;
+   font-weight: 400;
+   margin-left: 50px;
+ }
+ 
+ /* è¯¾ç¨‹åˆ†ç±»å’Œæ ‡ç­¾å®¹å™¨ */
+ .category-nav-container {
+   display: flex;
+   flex-direction: column;
+   margin-left: 52px;

+ }
+ 
+ /* èƒ¶å›ŠæŒ‰é’®æ ·å¼ - ä¸“åŒºæŒ‰é’®ä¸“ç”¨ */
+ .capsule-category-btn {
+   display: inline-block;
+   background-color: transparent;
+   color: #000;
+   padding: 8px 16px;
+   border-radius: 18px;
+   height: 36px;

+   font-size: 18px;
+   font-weight: 400;

+ /* æ ‡ç­¾å¯¼èˆªæ ·å¼ */
+ .uai-nav-capsule {
+   border: none;
```

```diff
+ // æŒ‰é˜¶æ®µå’Œæ ‡ç­¾ç­›é€‰è¯¾ç¨‹çš„è¾…åŠ©å‡½æ•°
+ export function getCoursesByStageAndTag(stage: string, tag: string, limit: number = 4): Course[] {
+   return mockCourses
+     .filter(course => course.stage === stage && course.tags.includes(tag))
+     .slice(0, limit)
+ }
+ 
+ // è·å–éšæœºè¯¾ç¨‹çš„è¾…åŠ©å‡½æ•°
+ export function getRandomCourses(count: number = 4): Course[] {
+   const shuffled = [...mockCourses].sort(() => 0.5 - Math.random())
+   return shuffled.slice(0, count)
+ }
```

```diff
+ // æ»šåŠ¨å¤„ç†
+ const handleScroll = () => {
+   const currentScrollY = window.scrollY
+   
+   // å¯¼èˆªæ é˜´å½±æ•ˆæœ
+   isScrolled.value = currentScrollY > 0
+   
+   // å¯¼èˆªæ éšè—æ•ˆæœï¼ˆå‘ä¸‹æ»šåŠ¨æ—¶éšè—ï¼‰
+   if (currentScrollY > 100 && currentScrollY > lastScrollY.value) {
+     isHidden.value = true
+   } else {
+     isHidden.value = false
+   }
+   
+   lastScrollY.value = currentScrollY
+ }
+ 
+ // ä¸‹æ‹‰èœå•æ§åˆ¶
+ const showDropdown = (menu: 'career' | 'courses') => {
+   dropdowns.value[menu] = true
+ }
+ 
+ const hideDropdown = (menu: 'career' | 'courses') => {
+   dropdowns.value[menu] = false
+ }
+ 
+ // å¯¼èˆªèœå•åˆ‡æ¢
+ const toggleNav = () => {
+   isNavOpen.value = !isNavOpen.value
+ }
+ 
+ // äº‹ä»¶å¤„ç†
+ const navigate = (page: string) => {
+   emit('navigate', page)
+   isNavOpen.value = false // å…³é—­ç§»åŠ¨ç«¯èœå•
+ }
+ 
+ const handleSearch = () => {
+   if (searchQuery.value.trim()) {
+     emit('search', searchQuery.value.trim())
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ const login = () => {
+   emit('login')
+ }
+ 
+ const register = () => {
+   emit('register')
+ }
+ 
+ const openCart = () => {
+   emit('openCart')
+ }
+ 
+ // ç”Ÿå‘½å‘¨æœŸ
+ onMounted(() => {
+   window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll)
+ })
+ 
+ onUnmounted(() => {
+   window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll)
+ })
+ </script>
+
```
